Html:
Hello friends,

I am Ajay. New here. I have a question. Can we create Funnel Graph using PHP Excel?
Could not find help in docs.

Ajay

A funnel chart in MS Excel is simply a stacked column, using the 2d or 3d pyramid, so yes it's possible.... just a bit awkward as you have to reverse (negate) the values to get a funnel rather than a pyramid
